![](http://i.imgur.com/efteOfI.png)

Hello LET members,

**KVMVPS is proud to announce our New Buffalo, NY, USA KVM Plans!**

**[Website (Click Here)](http://www.kvmvps.us)**

We are a USA based company offering solutions to Virtual Private Server owners. KVMVPS servers are located in the United States of America and Netherlands with the highest grade of premium bandwidth. All servers come with SolusVM control panel with several features. KVMVPS strives to keep customers happy with 100% uptime. If by any chance we do not give 100% up-time, our service level agreement is sure to cover it. We make sure that all Virtual Machines are strictly updated with the top demands of software. Our budget plans allow you to start easily and grow. Our KVM servers run on the highest demand of features and have a guarantee of 100% Uptime.

**Server Location: Buffalo, NY, USA**

**Node Specifications**: Intel E3 Processor, 32 GB DDR3 Ram, 4x500 GB HDD

<h2>Why you should choose us?</h2>

<p>*100% Uptime/ If not Service level agreement covers the costs.<br />
  * Truly Dedicated support.<br />
  * Fully optimized control panel with several features.<br />
  * Raid-10 Protected Diskspace.<br />
  * <strong>1x1 Gigabit portspeed.</strong><br />
  * On demand OS re-installs.<br />
  * FREE Windows!<br /></p>

**Kvmvps#1 -- LET Special 1:**

    512 MB DDR3 Ram
    25 GB SATA 3 HDD (Raid -10)
    1 Ipv4 Address
    1000 GB Bandwidth
    2 CPU Cores @ 3.3 GHz
    1x1 GBPS Portspeed
Price - $4.49 -- [Order Now!](http://client.kvmvps.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)

**Kvmvps#2 -- LET Special 2:**

    1024 MB DDR3 Ram
    40 GB SATA 3 HDD (Raid -10)
    1 Ipv4 Address
    2000 GB Bandwidth
    2 CPU Cores @ 3.3 GHz
    1x1 GBPS Portspeed
Price - $6.99 -- [Order Now!](http://client.kvmvps.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=16)

Warm regards, Ryyan
